import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{gsap}from'gsap';import{TextPlugin}from'gsap/TextPlugin';import BookNowButton from'./BookNowButton';import BookNowForm from'./BookNowForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";gsap.registerPlugin(TextPlugin);const Hero=_ref=>{let{isOpen,handleOpenBookNow,handleCloseBookNow}=_ref;const textRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const text='KowTattys';const textArray=text.split('');const textTimeline=gsap.timeline({repeat:-1});textArray.forEach((char,index)=>{textTimeline.to(textRef.current,{duration:0.1,text:textArray.slice(0,index+1).join('')});});textTimeline.to({},{duration:5});// add 5 seconds delay before repeating
